text: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: Know that Allah is severe in penalty and that Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
translation.id.indonesian: Ketahuilah, bahwa sesungguhnya Allah amat berat siksa-Nya dan bahwa sesungguhnya Allah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
